'Paulien Hogeweg' (b. 1943) is a Dutch theoretical biologist and complex systems
researcher studying biological systems as dynamic information processing systems
at many interconnected levels.

In 1970, Ben Hesper and she defined the term bioinformatics Hesper
B., Hogeweg P. (1970.) "Bioinformatica: een werkconcept", Kameleon,
1(6): 28â29. as "the study of informatic processes in
biotic systems".
